title: ADD SYNCHRONIZATION OF CONNECTION'S (TEAM WORK) VERY IMPORTANT!!!!!!!!!!!
author: Uzuvira

comments.snippet: Have you looked into the SQL option? Our team has been using that for awhile now successfully. Just ensure you have frequent backups as the db has been wiped out twice with no known cause.
comments.author: kramttocs

comments.snippet: That will be posible with connection and usr profiles implemented. Settings stay per app but elevated user (admin) will be able to set user profiles to provide what connection profile could be loaded. Access to profiles will be hold by ACL or AD identity
comments.author: Kvarkas

comments.snippet:
Triage refresh (P4 version-label debt): this issue is tagged with legacy version labels. Please retest on the latest build (fork v1.79.x or upstream dev), then share reproducible steps and expected vs actual behavior. If still valid, keep open and relabel to current triage scope (for example Need 2 check). If fixed, close with resolution.

Current legacy version labels: 1.78.*
comments.author: robertpopa22
